text: 8-week transformation doing Jeff Nippard's PPL program. Gained 4kg lean mass with creatine monohydrate 5g daily and whey protein post-workout. Bench went from 60kg to 80kg. Progressive overload is the key. Diet was 2500cal high protein. #gymtransformation #bulking
author: lift_heavy_kr

text: Started the 75 Hard Challenge. Running 5km outdoor every morning plus evening yoga for flexibility. Already lost 3kg in 2 weeks. The mental discipline part is the hardest. No alcohol no cheat meals. Using MyFitnessPal for calorie tracking at 1800cal deficit.
author: challenge_mode
